response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation that I believe could significantly enhance your life or business. I understand that its true worth might be subjective, but I am confident that you will appreciate its quality and significance.

I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value, which I believe reflects my desire to find the right person who truly appreciates its essence.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide additional information or arrange a viewing.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
